pageContent:
CHARLES E. WOLVEN 
Buford, GA 30518 | 312.907.1286 | chew1414@gmail.com | https://www.linkedin.com/in/charles-wolven 
 
WINDOWS SERVER ENGINEER 
Experienced Windows Server Engineer skilled in automating server builds, application deployments and database updates. Proficient 
in server and workstation virtualization, Active Directory, and AWS infrastructure. Strong PowerShell scripting skills for deployment, 
security, upgrades, patching, and disaster recovery. Skilled in DevOps and Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD). 
 
KEY SKILLS 
Server Administration | Scripting/Automation Expert | Agile principles | DevOps Collaboration 
Group Policy | Troubleshooting/ Problem Solver | CMDB/ITIL Management | Communication | Critical thinking | Dependable | 
Flexible | Listener | Professional | Documentation | Training 
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Scripting: Microsoft PowerShell | Install Shield | Win Batch | Altiris Rapid Deployment Pack | Sysprep

vSphere | Infoblox Grid Manager | DELL Power Protect Data Manager (PPDM) 
Software: Microsoft Office Suite | Microsoft Remote Desktop Connection Manager | Microsoft SQL Server | Okta Administration |
